sentences.english: But the life of the modern world has been recorded on film in massive, encyclopaedic detail.
sentences.chinese: 而現代生活的方方面面都被電影記錄了下來。

sentences.english: Just about every aspect of a website can be split-tested.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎網頁的所有方方面面都可以進行對比測試。

sentences.english: Another swathed himself in a raincoat and duct tape before fleeing the area a few hours later.
sentences.chinese: 另一面面和膠布雨衣前逃離該地區幾個小時後他自己。

sentences.english: Their plan embraced all aspects of the rescue.
sentences.chinese: 他們的計劃包含了營救的方方面面。

sentences.english: This kind of beauty and aesthetic permeates through all aspects of Han culture.
sentences.chinese: 這種美滲透於漢文化的方方面面。

sentences.english: The motivational mindset unfolds and drives every aspect of our lives.
sentences.chinese: 動機心態反映並驅動着我們生活中的方方面面。

sentences.english: Moon River, I'll cross you in style some day .
sentences.chinese: 月亮河，總有一天我會體體面面地把你渡過。

sentences.english: How do you think about how to balance it internally if you're trying to get all that?
sentences.chinese: 如果你想面面俱到，該如何保持遊戲的平衡性呢？

sentences.english: This article proposed that counter-dumping needs the enterprise aspects the support.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出反傾銷需要企業方方面面的支持。

sentences.english: It touches every aspect of our lives.
sentences.chinese: 它觸動了我們生活的方方面面。

sentences.english: Well, don"t listen to that, because they do at least help."
sentences.chinese: 噢，別思少啦，至少他們可以助您“酷”一面面哦。

sentences.english: And he attaches importance to the theories as well as pays close attention to reality. Thirdly, his methodological consciousness is stro…
sentences.chinese: 其修辭思想的方方面面受到學界的高度好評和關注。

sentences.english: All those things have to get better in the post-season, particularly against the Jazz or Spurs.
sentences.chinese: 季後賽火箭方方面面都要提升，尤其是打爵士或馬刺。

sentences.english: This affects all aspects of society, as also all-inclusive.
sentences.chinese: 這種影響涵蓋了社會的方方面面。

sentences.english: Also because of such, environmental protection is thorough already the square field surface that the Maldivian lives.
sentences.chinese: 也正因如此，環保已深入馬爾代夫人生活的方方面面。

sentences.english: There are no all-embracing EC directives on race equality.
sentences.chinese: 關於種族平等，歐盟指令也無法面面俱到。
